Apps_List.title: Lists all of the user applications.
Apps_List.description: Lists all of the user applications.

Apps_ListCortanaEndpoints.title: Gets the endpoint URLs for the prebuilt Cortana applications.
Apps_ListCortanaEndpoints.description: Gets the endpoint URLs for the prebuilt Cortana applications.

Apps_ListAvailableCustomPrebuiltDomains.title: Gets all the available custom prebuilt domains for all cultures.
Apps_ListAvailableCustomPrebuiltDomains.description: Gets all the available custom prebuilt domains for all cultures.

Apps_AddCustomPrebuiltDomain.title: Adds a prebuilt domain along with its models as a new application.
Apps_AddCustomPrebuiltDomain.description: Adds a prebuilt domain along with its models as a new application.

Apps_ListAvailableCustomPrebuiltDomainsF.title: Gets all the available custom prebuilt domains for a specific culture.
Apps_ListAvailableCustomPrebuiltDomainsF.description: Gets all the available custom prebuilt domains for a specific culture.

Apps_Import.title: Imports an application to LUIS, the application's structure should be included in the request body.
Apps_Import.description: Imports an application to LUIS, the application's structure should be included in the request body.

Apps_ListUsageScenarios.title: Gets the application available usage scenarios.
Apps_ListUsageScenarios.description: Gets the application available usage scenarios.

Apps_Update.title: Updates the name or description of the application.
Apps_Update.description: Updates the name or description of the application.

AzureAccounts_RemoveFromApp.title: apps - Removes an assigned LUIS azure account from an application
AzureAccounts_RemoveFromApp.description: Removes assigned azure account from the application.

AzureAccounts_GetAssigned.title: apps - Get LUIS azure accounts assigned to the application
AzureAccounts_GetAssigned.description: Gets the LUIS azure accounts assigned to the application for the user using his ARM token.

AzureAccounts_AssignToApp.title: apps - Assign a LUIS azure account to an application
AzureAccounts_AssignToApp.description: Assigns an azure account to the application.

Apps_ListEndpoints.title: Returns the available endpoint deployment regions and URLs.
Apps_ListEndpoints.description: Returns the available endpoint deployment regions and URLs.

Permissions_Delete.title: Removes a user from the allowed list of users to access this LUIS application. Users are removed using their email address.
Permissions_Delete.description: Removes a user from the allowed list of users to access this LUIS application. Users are removed using their email address.

Permissions_List.title: Gets the list of user emails that have permissions to access your application.
Permissions_List.description: Gets the list of user emails that have permissions to access your application.

Permissions_Add.title: Adds a user to the allowed list of users to access this LUIS application. Users are added using their email address.
Permissions_Add.description: Adds a user to the allowed list of users to access this LUIS application. Users are added using their email address.

Permissions_Update.title: Replaces the current users access list with the one sent in the body. If an empty list is sent, all access to other users will be removed.
Permissions_Update.description: Replaces the current users access list with the one sent in the body. If an empty list is sent, all access to other users will be removed.

Apps_Publish.title: Publishes a specific version of the application.
Apps_Publish.description: Publishes a specific version of the application.

Apps_DownloadQueryLogs.title: Gets the query logs of the past month for the application.
Apps_DownloadQueryLogs.description: Gets the query logs of the past month for the application.

Versions_Import.title: Imports a new version into a LUIS application.
Versions_Import.description: Imports a new version into a LUIS application.

Versions_Update.title: Updates the name or description of the application version.
Versions_Update.description: Updates the name or description of the application version.

Versions_Clone.title: Creates a new version using the current snapshot of the selected application version.
Versions_Clone.description: Creates a new version using the current snapshot of the selected application version.

Train_GetStatus.title: Gets the training status of all models (intents and entities) for the specified LUIS app. You must call the train API to train the LUIS app before you call this API to get training status. "appID" specifies the LUIS app ID. "versionId" specifies the version number of the LUIS app. For example, "0.1".
Train_GetStatus.description: Gets the training status of all models (intents and entities) for the specified LUIS app. You must call the train API to train the LUIS app before you call this API to get training status. "appID" specifies the LUIS app ID. "versionId" specifies the version number of the LUIS app. For example, "0.1".

Train_TrainVersion.title: Sends a training request for a version of a specified LUIS app. This POST request initiates a request asynchronously. To determine whether the training request is successful, submit a GET request to get training status. Note: The application version is not fully trained unless all the models (intents and entities) are trained successfully or are up to date. To verify training success, get the training status at least once after training is complete.
Train_TrainVersion.description: Sends a training request for a version of a specified LUIS app. This POST request initiates a request asynchronously. To determine whether the training request is successful, submit a GET request to get training status. Note: The application version is not fully trained unless all the models (intents and entities) are trained successfully or are up to date. To verify training success, get the training status at least once after training is complete.

AzureAccounts_GetUserLUISAccounts.title: user - Get LUIS azure accounts
AzureAccounts_GetUserLUISAccounts.description: Gets the LUIS azure accounts for the user using his ARM token.

Apps_PackagePublishedApplicationAsGzip.title: package - Gets published LUIS application package in binary stream GZip format
Apps_PackagePublishedApplicationAsGzip.description: Packages published LUIS application as GZip.

Apps_PackageTrainedApplicationAsGzip.title: package - Gets trained LUIS application package in binary stream GZip format
Apps_PackageTrainedApplicationAsGzip.description: Packages trained LUIS application as GZip.
